Notes: A large Piranha Plant boss. Before the battle, it remains inside its shell. In order to defeat it, the player has to fling its tail ball with a Spin Attack four times. It always damages the player upon contact. However, the large tail ball does not hurt the player. In SMG1, it will always spawn a Power Star when defeated, which requires a properly configured Scenario entry.

Obj_arg7.Name: Camera Register Index
Obj_arg7.Description: Specifies the starting index of the vector register camera.

SW_A.Description: Starts the boss battle once activated.

BaseMtxFollowTarget.Description: Objects of this class can be followed by another BaseMtxFollower object.
